author: ozeigermann
msg: Base interface for a transaction including more than one resource manager. 2PC is not intended.

author: amassari
msg: Use XMLSize_t when calling transcodeTo or encode

author: ozeigermann
msg: Removed suspend/resume code as this is not applicable to our implementation. Might be reintroduced by an XA implementation later.

author: ritchiem
msg: Added a logger but only used to control the toString inclusion of password. If in debug mode it will include password otherwise the password is "********".
